title: 3 Best Altcoins That Could Shoot to the Moon
description: Discover the top three altcoins with high potential in the cryptocurrency market. title: Most Americans Favor Making AI-Generated Content Illegal
description: In a recent poll by the AI Policy Institute (AIPI), 80 per cent of Americans expressed their belief that presenting AI-generated content as if humans authored it should be illegal. The survey focused on public sentiment regarding the use of artificial intelligence in content creation, particularly in a recent controversy involving Sports Illustrated, where AI […]

title: Nigerian central bank lifts ban on crypto transactions
description: Nigeria lifted a ban on crypto trading, first instituted in February 2021 due to concerns about potential money laundering and terrorism financing.
